vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰουδα-ϊσμός, ὁ, “
Judaism”, [LXX+NT]:
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Judaism, "Judaism"
Judaism, the character and condition of a Jew; practice of the Jewish religion, Gal. 1:13, 14*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: judaísmo (de la religión judía y un estilo de vida)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 猶太教, 猶太主義 (加 1:13-14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 犹太教, 犹太主义 (加 1:13-14)
